static BOOL ARPoint3DEquals ( ARPoint3D  a,
ARPoint3D  b 
) [inline, static]

Determines whether two points represent the same real value. No epsilon is used, so use caution when applying to values that may be affected by floating point errors.

Parameters:
a first point to compare
a second point to compare
Returns:
YES if the points are equal, NO otherwise.
